official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the United States Mint, for fiscal years 1989 and 1990, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations for FY 1989 and 1990 for the United States Mint to pay the costs of the mints and assay offices. Specifies that a certain amount of funds shall remain available until expended for research and development. Authorizes appropriations to the Department of the Treasury for increases in salary, pay, retirement, other benefits for Mint employees, and for other nondiscretionary costs.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the United States Mint, for fiscal years 1989 and 1990, and for other purposes.
